transcription.text: One of Thor: Ragnarok's most heartbreaking moments is also one of its most beautiful. Adelaide-based VFX company Rising Sun Pictures created the pivotal moment where Tessa Thompson's character recounts the fatal encounter between the Valkyrie warriors and the Asgardian Goddess of Death, Hela. The flashback happens in artful slow motion, with the carnage captured under glittering light thanks to an innovative lighting rig designed by Satellite Lab to create high-speed changes in lighting. Rising Sun Pictures also demonstrated their expertise in slow-motion VFX in X-Men: Days of Future Past.
